title: The Party for "Charles White: A Retrospective"
hero_caption: Charles White, printed and published by Edward Hamilton. Love Letter III, 1977. Margaret Fisher Fund. © The Charles White Archives Inc.
description:
Celebrate the opening of Charles White: A Retrospective with this special evening honoring the legacy of a remarkable artist who was integrally connected to the history and cultural life of Chicago. This after-hours event, co-hosted by the museum’s Leadership Advisory Committee (LAC), provides the premier public viewing of the highly anticipated Charles White: A Retrospective—the first major career survey in over 30 years. A reception in the Modern Wing’s Griffin Court follows featuring live music and entertainment, cocktails, and appetizers.

With VIP and Sponsor-level tickets, your evening also includes an elegant pre-celebration reception on the museum’s Bluhm Family Terrace, with stunning views of the city’s skyline and Millennium Park, beginning at 5:30.

For the VIP reception, use the Modern Wing entrance at 159 East Monroe Street.
For the 6:30 celebration, enter through the Pritzker Garden at 230 South Columbus Drive.

Attire: Cocktail Chic

Individual Ticket $125
Admission for 1
Open bar and food stations throughout the evening

VIP and Sponsor Tickets
Harvest Talk Sponsor: $10,000
• 10 reserved section tickets
• 10 catalogues
• 10 tickets for aspiring young professionals, artists, and cultural leaders to attend the opening celebration
• Recognition in sponsorship acknowledgments
• Name included in event press, social media, and event feature on museum website
• VIP reception with Charles White family, visiting dignitaries, and exhibition sponsors and lenders

Love Letter Sponsor: $5,000
• 5 reserved section tickets
• 5 catalogues
• 5 tickets for aspiring young professionals, artists and cultural leaders to attend the opening celebration
• Mention on event social media, event feature on museum website
• Recognition in sponsorship acknowledgments
• VIP reception with Charles White family, visiting dignitaries, exhibition sponsors and lenders

This, My Brother VIP Ticket: $1,000
• 1 reserved section ticket
• 1 catalogue
• VIP reception with Charles White family, visiting dignitaries, and exhibition sponsors and lenders
• Mention in program

Honorary Event Chair: Darrel Hackett, BMO Harris Bank
Event Co-chairs: Diane Dinkins-Carr and Steven Hunter

Proceeds from the event will help support the museum’s efforts to provide accessible and community-based programming.

Attendees must be 21+, and valid ID is required upon entry. Your contribution is tax-deductible to the extent allowed by law.
